word: G4883 - συναρμολογέω - synarmologéō - soon-ar-mol-og-eh'-o - Be fitly framed together

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Be fitly framed together
to join closely together; to frame together

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4862 and a derivative of a compound of G719 and G3004 (in its original sense of laying); to render close jointed together, that is, organize compactly: - be fitly framed (joined) together.
